prompt: Generate realistic text messages that represent non-spam (ham) content. These messages should reflect a broad spectrum of everyday communication, including personal conversations, legitimate business or service notifications, casual updates, and automated alerts. Vary the tone (friendly, professional, neutral, concerned), language style (informal chats, formal announcements, concise or detailed), and topics (meeting or appointment reminders, family or friend check-ins, order or delivery confirmations, bank transaction alerts, community or event updates). Include diverse formats like quick one-word replies, detailed explanations, friendly greetings, or automated system messages (e.g., OTP codes, subscription reminders). Ensure the content simulates authentic, non-malicious communication across different contexts, relationships, and platforms, avoiding any deceptive or promotional undertones.
response:
Hey! Just checking in to see how you’re doing.  
Can we reschedule our meeting to Thursday instead?  
Your package has been shipped! Track it here: [link].  
I’ll be at the coffee shop at 3. See you there!  
Reminder: Your appointment is tomorrow at 10 AM.  
Just wanted to let you know I got your message.  
Don’t forget to bring the documents for our meeting!  
Your monthly subscription has been renewed successfully.  
I’m on my way! Should be there in about 15 minutes.  
Can you pick up some milk on your way home?  
Hi, this is an automated message to confirm your OTP: 123456.  
Family dinner at our place this Sunday! Let me know if you can make it.  
Your bank statement is ready for viewing online.  
Thanks for the great chat earlier! Let’s catch up again soon.  
Just a quick reminder about the community meeting tomorrow night.  
I really enjoyed the movie last night! We should do that again.  
Your order will arrive between 2 PM and 4 PM today.  
Hey, are we still on for the hike this weekend?  
Please confirm your attendance for the upcoming workshop.  
I hope you’re feeling better! Let me know if you need anything.  
Your flight has been confirmed for departure on March 12th.  
Looking forward to our call tomorrow!  
Can you let me know if you received the files I sent?  
Thanks for sending over the report; it looks great!  
Just wanted to remind you about the deadline next week.  
I’m running late, but I’ll text you when I’m close.  
Please update me on the project status when you can.  
It was so nice to see you at the event!  
Your password has been successfully changed.  
Let’s plan a weekend getaway soon!  
I’ll handle the arrangements for the meeting.  
Your feedback is appreciated! Thanks for sharing your thoughts.  
Just a heads up: the server will be down for maintenance tonight.  
I’m really proud of you for finishing that project!  
Can you confirm if you’ll be attending the wedding next month?  
I received your payment; thank you for being prompt!  
Have a great day! Looking forward to our next chat.  
Your appointment has been successfully canceled.  
Just checking in to see if you need any help with your move.  
The event starts at 6 PM; don’t be late!  
I love your new haircut! It really suits you!  
Your loan application is under review; we’ll contact you soon.  
I can’t believe it’s almost the weekend! Any plans?  
Thanks for helping me with that presentation.  
Your subscription will expire in 3 days; please renew.  
I’ll be out of the office tomorrow but will respond when I return.  
Can you send me the link to that article you mentioned?  
Your feedback is important to us; we appreciate your input!  
I’m so excited for our trip next month!  
Just checking to see if you’re free for lunch this week.  
The workshop will cover essential skills for your career growth.  
I hope everything is okay; I haven’t heard from you in a while.  
Your delivery has been successfully completed.  
Looking forward to seeing everyone at the family reunion!
